BBDE1.A.DE.N.BAA1.P2XF00000.G.C.I10.L: Output in the production sector / At constant prices / Germany / Main construction industry / Unadjusted figure

General: 1 Source of the original data: Federal Statistical Office. - 2 Territorial definition: Germany as of 1991, prior to that western Germany (chain-linked over the annual average of 1991; Bundesbank calculation). - 3 Methodology:  Up to 1990 according to the national classification in the production sector (Sypro) (positions 72 to 75). As of 1991 according to the Statistical Classification of Economic Activities Rev. 2 (NACE Rev. 2) (positions  41.2, 42, 43.1  and 43.9)
